Know About Regulatory Services

We Are Commited To Share The Owner With All The Details Of His Project And We Believe In This We Provide The Owner With Surveillance Cameras In The Project That Allows Him To See His Own Project Anytime And Anyplace And Therefore We Feel Our Customers And Their Commtments In Their Working ANd Personal Lives, We Save Our Customers Time And Not Exert Effort And Effort Worried About The Implementation Of Their Project.

Building Management Services

Our Institution Enjoys Having All The Resources Sufficient To Manage Buildings Comprehensively, Accurately And Flexibly, ANd To Maintain The Building Within A Comfortable And Safe Atmosphere For All Users And Residents In The Building, Especially Buildings Owned By More Than One Owner, Buildings Of Establishments, Instituations, Organizations And Offices. This Service Offers Many Professional Features For Building Management That Can Be Filled With The Following Featrures:

  • Comprehensive Management Of Construction In All Parts
  • Raise The Market Value Of The Building
  • Sustainability And Longevity Of The Building
  • The Balance And Consistency Of The Building's Components
  • Reducing The Cost Of Building Mangement
  • Better use Of The Building Effectively And Flexible
  • Increase The Income Of The Building
  • Show The Quality Of The Building With Its Facilities And Notify Users
  • General And Comprehensively Maintainance Of All The Building's Internal And External Facilities.

Diversity In Implementation Methods

The Foundation Adopts Many Flexible Ways To Implement Its Services in Projects In Order To See The Importance Of The Participation Of Customers In their Opinions And Aspirations In All The Pillars The Project And Give Comfort ANd Satisfaction In The Style Of COntarcting With Our Partners, Which Can Be Summarized These Contracts By:

Hold The Total Lump Sum/Skimmer Price

A Fixed Amount Is Agreed For The Implementation Of The Project Or An Item Of The Project And Is Used In Items That Are Difficult To Measure Such As Demolition And Restoration.

Cost Contract + Cost Plus Profit Ratio

It Is The Type That Is Widespread Between Small Companies ANd Entrepreneurship And Is A Percentage Of Profit Agreed By The Contractor With The Owner For Supervising The Implementation And A Percentage Of The Total Value Of The Execution Of The Item And Ranging From 10% To 25%

Target Cost Contract

It Is The Same As The Previous Contract And Puts A Percentage On The Implementation After The Owner Puts A Limit That Cann't Be Exceeded The Price

Contract Unit Price

It Is The Common Type In The Contractor's Account ANd It Is A Measure Of The Works And Includes Specifications And Approximate Quantites And The Contractor Determines The Price Of The Execution Of A Category For Each Item And There In This Item Of COntracts The Possibility Of The Contractor Obtaining The Difference Of Prices When They Rise.

Keep away from people who try to be little your ambitions Small people always do that but the really great Friendly.
